answers.answer_content:
I'm quite satisfied with the Blue Max desk lamp from Full Spectrum.  It's very powerful and it's goose neck can be adjusted to make the lamp horizontal or vertical,  It's reasonably priced.

This ad mentions a combination of desk lamp with a second lamp just for waking up, which I didn't buy.  

http://www.bluemaxlighting.com/

Light exposure is one of the 6 key lifestyle factors in the healthy lifestyle program detailed by therapist/researcher Stephen Ilardi in his book The Depression Cure.
